name: Champion Zerato
description: An arrogant and impudent supremacist who only cares about strength
story: Incredibly skilled in fighting, Champion Zerato boasts a flawless win streak, largely thanks to his refusal to fight anyone he may be at risk of losing to. Frost Mage Zerato has been trying to pick a fight with him for a long time, but Champion Zerato keeps making excuses to avoid it.
get_line: If you want to know what a genius looks like, eat your heart out.

relations.description: Despite his impressive strength, Dingo refuses to fight Champion Zerato, displeasing him greatly.
A sad little dog that always hangs around Dingo. Even learning his name would be a waste of time.
Champion Zerato was impressed by the potential shown by Sven, enough to even bother remembering his name.

specialty.name: Victory Streak
specialty.description: He does not want to break his winning streak.

skills.name: Earthen Rage
skills.description: Attacks two enemies including the target with an earthen blast, transferring two debuffs from the caster to the enemy and recovering the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

debuffs.name: Sleep
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns. Decreases Critical Hit Resistance by 100%, and the effect is dispelled at the moment the target suffers damage from an attack.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

common.name: Transfer
common.effect: Transfers debuffs from the caster to the target.

skill1.name: 大地の怒り
skill1.desc: 対象を含む敵2体に攻撃し、自身の弱体効果を2つ転移させ、自身の生命力を回復する。自身の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。

skill2.name: 強靭な意志
skill2.desc: スタン・睡眠・命中率DOWN状態にならない。攻撃を受けた時、自身が弱体状態の場合、80.0%の確率で反撃する。

skill3.name: 天災地変
skill3.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、60.0%の確率で防御力DOWN・攻撃力DOWNを1ターンの間付与する。自身に防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。
skill3.soul_description: 敵全体に攻撃し、60.0%の確率で防御力DOWN・攻撃力DOWNを1ターンの間付与する。自身に防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。
